channel.title: Distinction 562+
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1238.photobucket.com/albums/ff495/xForlornex/Banner.png[/img][/CENTER]
Client: [url=http://up.ht/tewK8T]http://up.ht/tewK8T[/url] Client IP: xwretchedx.no-ip.biz Site: [url=http://distinction.x10.mx/home.php]http://distinction.x10.mx/home.php[/url] Forums + Website: http://distinctionrsps.webs.com/ [SIZE=6][B][U]Features[/U][/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#0000ff]Almost All Skills Working Summoning Hunting Dungeoneering Items 5 Mini Games Bank Pin Good Economy Awesome PvP 74 Custom Commands Custom Task Teleport page 26 Custom Shops 1021 Items in shops 974 Custom NPC spawns 1816 Custom NPC Drops AND MUCH MUCH MORE[/COLOR]
[SIZE=5][B][CENTER]About Project Distinction[/CENTER][/B][/SIZE]
[CENTER][FONT=Comic Sans MS]I am making this server because I am tired of seeing other servers where you can get Primal and Vesta with one quick click in the shops! I am tired of all RSPS's
Being so easy. Yes there will still be hundreds of items in the shops, but the one's you will have to work for will be the best. This isn't going to be some extremely
easy server where you can get all level 99 skills in one day. But it won't be like real Runescape either. I am dedicated to working on this for you guys who are tired
of other RSPS's where everyone has 2147m. On that note, here we go..[/FONT]
[B][SIZE=5]MAKE SURE TO HIT THE THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND FOR ME TO KEEP IT UP.[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
[COLOR=#0000CD][SIZE=2][CENTER][U]Staff[/U][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR] [FONT=Comic Sans MS][B][CENTER]Wretched: Owner/Head-Developer Ultikiller20: 2nd Developer / Helful suggestions 2 MORE SPOTS LEFT 2 MORE SPOTS LEFT[/CENTER][/B][/FONT]
( Not Much of a team yet... PM me if you'd like to join )
[CENTER][SIZE=2][COLOR=#FF0000]Red --- Not Started[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Orange --- In Progress[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Green --- Finished[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
Updates
10/20/2011
Added 6 Custom Shops. Total of 236 items. Deleted Uneeded commands DELETED EVERY NPC AND THEIR DROPS Made a New commands interface Made a Home Command (Ardrougne) No one ever uses home here! So I was like what the heck alright. Added Bank PIN Added Changing Clothes
10/21/2011
Added 8 new Shops. Check the list below. (total of 282 items added today) Added new shop NPCS Edited most of 562's trade bugs/Money bug
10/22/2011
Fixed 22 Skills (about 60% How I want them to be) Added 10 Shops (total of 274 items) Fixed some teleports Fixed Castlewars Added Shop names Added a skills area made some skills interfaces
10/24/11
Added 367 Custom NPC's Cleaned up the shops Made a Donator Zone Made a Skilling zone Added custom object spawns Added all custom NPC's Added a Bank Pin Added all the teleport commands for the NPC's
10/25/11
Fixed minor bugs Fixed some teleports to the new NPC's Fixed skill xp ratios (made them harder) Working on fixing theiving Added new slayer task Fixed the slayer XP
Working on Fixing the selling Items to store Adding some suggested items to shops Fixing theiving
10/30/2011 Added 20 more npcs Added more drops Added some more point systems Forums in progress Added real runescape npc definitions Fixed some item definitions Added NEX to the server Fixed some bugs Fixed thieving Added 1 click NPCs Added 1 click item pickup Added some more PK zones
Lot more Done just check it out!!!!
Shops [CENTER][B]Player Shops[/B][/CENTER]
[COLOR=#00FF00]Armor Store 1 - Basic Armor Armor Store 2 - More basic Armor Gilded Store - Guthix, Saradomin, Bandos, Armadyl, Ancient, Zamorak, Black G, Adamant G, Rune G, and Rune T ( No tassets or Chestplates etc..) Weapon Store 1 Weapon Store 2 Magic Store Magic Armor Store Magic Runes Range Store Range Armor Store range ammo Supplies PK Shop Food + Pots Shop Woodcutting + Fire making Shop Fishing + Cooking Mining/ Smithing Shop Herblore/Farming Shop - Seeds only... No herbs. It'd be too easy Team Cape Shop Cape Shop Gloves + Boots Shop Crafting + Fletching Shop Rune Crafting + Hunter Store Slayer Supplies Summoning Store[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]Construction Shop Slayer Supplies[/COLOR]
[CENTER][B]Donator/Moderator Shops[/B][/CENTER] [COLOR=#00FF00]Dungeoneering Armor store 1 - All Dungeoneering Helms, Bodies, Legs, Kites Dungeoneering Armor store 2 - All the other Dungeoneering Items Donator Armor Store - The best dragon armor, Spirit Shields, 3rd Age, Black Elite, and the tassets and chestplates.[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Dragon Weapons/Best Weapons[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]Dungeoneering Weapons Custom Item Store Rare Item Store 1 Rare Item Store 2[/COLOR]
Interfaces
[COLOR=#00FF00]Commands Interface[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500]Startup Interface[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500]Skills Interface[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500]Teleport Interface (The Spell Book)[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]Rules Interface Interface for Wild[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Summoning Interface[/COLOR]
Skills
[COLOR=#00FF00]Mining[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Smithing[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Fishing[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Cooking Firemaking[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Woodcutting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Farming Agility Prayer Herblore[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Agility[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Thieving[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Fletching[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]RuneCrafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Summoning[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Hunting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]Construction[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Slayer[/COLOR]
Monsters + MiniGames
[SIZE=3]Monsters[/SIZE]
Slayer Tower All GW Bosses and their minions Every Demon Every dragon Every giant Moles all dagannoths All elementals barrelchest avatars barbarians rock crabs Hellhounds Skeletal Wyverns KBD TZ-TOK-JAD Corporal Beast Dark Beast Kalphite Queen Ice Queen Ice monsters Good training!
[COLOR=#FF8C00]GodWars[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Slayer Monsters[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Dungeoneering Monsters[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]PEST CONTROL CASTLE WARS[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Soul Wars[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]MANY MORE MONSTERS FOR TRAINING AND PROFIT[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]Monster drops for a good ECO[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Impling Hunter ( Or W/e it is called )[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]Duel Arena Custom Minigames[/COLOR]
Pictures [SIZE=2][U]Player Shops[/U][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2v3rejq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/jzwoax.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2v1q7uh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/3466qeg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29zzow.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2jc7fir.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2jc7fir.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1yo753.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/27zhnxy.png[/img]
[SIZE=2][U]Mod + Donator Shops[/U][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/vpd9ic.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zz0w7k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/jb3e2u.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Videos
[U][SIZE=2]Support Sigs[/SIZE][/U]
[IMG]http://i1238.photobucket.com/albums/ff495/xForlornex/Support.png[/img]
